summary: This module contains a suite of unit tests that validate the routing logic of the LiteLLM proxy server. The tests create mock FastAPI request objects and verify that helper functions correctly extract the request route, handle base URLs, nested paths, query parameters, and determine whether a request targets an LLM API endpoint.
business_intent: Ensure reliable request routing and API endpoint detection within the LiteLLM proxy, preventing misrouting and supporting accurate handling of LLM service calls.
